Shared Facilities Subject to detailed engineering, the preliminary list of material facilities to be owned and used by the generation-owning Co-Tenants to this Agreement, as Co-tenants with an undivided interest, is as follows:
Shared Facilities
The "Shared Facilities" will consist of: (i) three 115kV conductors (including the upgraded portion of Line 65-507) and ancillary equipment; (ii) new dead end structure designated as "Tag 65-507-DE1," to be located inside the West Medway II new switchyard and along the right-of-way for Line 65-507 and ancillary equipment; and (iii) new 115kV bus structure designated as "Tag 65-507-BS2," to be located inside West Medway II's new switchyard, and ancillary equipment. The Shared Facilities will end at the Point of Change of Ownership at the Transmission Owner's existing bridge structure within its Medway Station #65.
EXHIBIT B to SHARED INTERCONNECTION FACILITIES AGREEMENT Form of Bill of Sale
BILL OF SALE This BILL of SALE (this "Bill of Sale") is effective as of the later of (a) the effective date of the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement established by FERC or (b) the date construction of the Shared Facilities is sufficiently complete to allow use of the Shared Facilities by Jet 3 but immediately prior to energization of the Shared Facilities (such later date, the "Transfer Effective Date"), between Exelon West Medway, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company ("West Medway") and Exelon West Medway II, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company ("West Medway II"). West Medway and West Medway II are sometimes referred to in this Bill of Sale as a "Party" and, collectively, as the "Parties". WHEREAS, West Medway owns and operates an approximately 42 MW electric generating facility ("Jet 3") located in Massachusetts in the balancing authority area of ISO New England, Inc.; and WHEREAS, West Medway II is developing and intends to construct, own and operate the West Medway II Project at a site adjacent to Jet 3; and WHEREAS, in connection with the development of the West Medway II Project, certain electrical facilities all as described in Exhibit A to the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement (as hereinafter defined) (collectively, the "Shared Facilities") will be constructed; and WHEREAS, the terms and conditions of ownership, use, operation and maintenance of the Shared Facilities are set forth in that certain Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement to which the Parties are parties, dated even herewith (such agreement, as amended and supplemented from time to time, the "Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement"); NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the foregoing recitals and the mutual obligations and covenants of the Parties herein contained, and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby mutually acknowledged, the Parties hereto agree as follows: 1. Definitions. Defined terms used but not defined in this Bill of Sale will have the meanings given to such terms in the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement. 2. Conveyance of Shared Facilities. As of the Transfer Effective Date, West Medway II hereby sells, transfers, conveys, assigns, grants and delivers to West Medway and West Medway hereby accepts, an undivided interest, as a tenant in common, in and to the Shared Facilities in an amount equal to 16.87% of the Shared Facilities, resulting in West Medway II retaining an undivided interest, as a tenant in common in and to the Shared Facilities in an amount equal to 83.13% of the Shared Facilities, on the terms and subject to the conditions contained in the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement. 3. Warranties. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THE SHARED INTERCONNECTION FACILITIES AGREEMENT, THIS CONVEYANCE AND TRANSFER IS MADE "AS IS", "WITH ALL FAULTS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, ANY WARRANTIES OF QUALITY, MERCHANTABILITY, SUITABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, ANY WARRANTIES REGARDING THE EXISTENCE OF ANY SECURITY INTEREST, LIEN OR ENCUMBRANCE, AND ANY WARRANTIES ARISING BY COMMON LAW, EXCEPT THAT (A) WEST MEDWAY II REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT IT HAS GOOD AND MARKETABLE TITLE TO THE SHARED FACILITIES AND THAT IT IS GRANTING AN INTEREST IN SUCH SHARED FACILITIES UNDER THIS BILL OF SALE FREE AND CLEAR OF ALL LIENS, CLAIMS AND ENCUMBRANCES AND (B) EACH PARTY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT IT HAS THE FULL POWER, RIGHT AND AUTHORITY TO CONVEY THE SHARED FACILITIES CONVEYED HEREUNDER. 4. Conflicts with Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement. This Bill of Sale is subject to the terms and conditions of the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement. In the event of any conflict between this Bill of Sale and the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement, the Shared Interconnection Facilities Agreement shall control. 5. Entire Agreement; Amendments. This Bill of Sale and the agreements referenced herein, constitute the full and complete understanding of the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof. This Bill of Sale will not be modified or amended except in a writing signed by both Parties and no purported modifications or amendments, including without limitation any oral agreement (even if supported by new consideration), course of conduct or absence of a response to a unilateral communication, will otherwise be binding on either Party. 6. Governing Law. This Bill of Sale will be deemed made and prepared and will be construed and interpreted in accordance with the internal laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, without regard to principles of conflicts of law thereof that may require the application of the law of another jurisdiction. 7. Counterparts. This Bill of Sale may be executed in original, facsimile or pdf counterparts, each of which will be an original, but all of which, when taken together, will constitute one and the same instrument.
